coreAttributes.name: Raptor energy bar
coreAttributes.description: A small, Raptor-branded energy bar, which proudly states on the back to be of 'Over 80% meat content'. On the reverse of the wrapper, there's an image of a fit falcon-boy dominantly face-fucking a naked mouse-girl.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM) * 0.15)]

A powerful jolt of energy surges through [npc.namePos] body!

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM, 10)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_CRITICAL_DAMAGE, 10)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Tearing off the plastic wrapper, [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] a big bite out of the Raptor energy bar. Although its savoury, meaty taste has an artificial hint to it, it's not at all unpleasant, and so [npc.she] happily [npc.verb(finish)] it off, after which [npc.she] quickly [npc.verb(find)] [npc.herself] feeling full of energy.
useDescriptions.otherUse: Tearing off the plastic wrapper, [npc.name] [npc.verb(make)] [npc2.name] take a big bite out of the Raptor energy bar. Although its savoury, meaty taste has an artificial hint to it, it's not at all unpleasant, and so [npc2.she] happily [npc2.verb(finish)] it off, after which [npc2.she] quickly [npc2.verb(find)] [npc2.herself] feeling full of energy.
